There are three new housewives, unconfirmed by Bravo but then they never really announce cast members until just before the season begins to air, we typically hear everything from the Housewives on Twitter or Facebook.
One of the new housewives has become my new favorite already.
Heather Thomson already has several points in her favor before she utters her first word on screen. She is a true fashionista and has her own line of…wait for it….Shapewear! I love her already! This has got to be making Jill’s blood pressure rise by the minute. (I’m sure she’s enjoying her European vacation!) But there is more! A very close friend of mine has a connection to Heather, my friend’s sister-in-law was Heather’s roommate in College! So what do we already know about Heather? Here’s what I learned:
Heather was a fashionista even back in college, one of those people who look great no matter what they’re wearing. Heather could throw on a pair of jeans and a t-shirt and look like a million bucks! (don’t you hate people like that? lol) Heather took a year off after high school before heading off to Becker College in Massachusetts . She was a year older than most in her class and was able to drink a year before most in her class. Heather was the ultimate party girl, she is described as,“lovely, fun and the star of whatever room she is in”. Let’s see how she does as a Bravo Housewife!
Do you suppose that Bravo went and searched for someone with their own shapewear line just to get that last dig in at Zarin? Let’s face it, they’re not a dime a dozen, there are a whole lot of fashion designers out there but someone who designs shapewear had to be tough to find. All I can say is great casting- Bravo Bravo!!!
I can just see Jill’s face when she found out that the new Housewife designs shapewear,“Is this a joke?”Jill would say,“Bawby, find out if this woman has more money than we do. I can’t believe Bravo is doing this to me, the Shapewear is the only thing I have left and they replace me with this woman who has a shapewear line? Can they do that Bawby? Can we sue them?”
This has to be“Karma”in its most pure form!
I love this, Jilzy is twisting everything and blaming Ramona for getting her fired. US Weekly posted this:
Did Ramona Singer push Jill Zarin out of The Real Housewives of New York City?
Days after Bravo confirmed reports that Zarin, 47, would not be returning for a fifth season, a source told the new issue of Us Weekly (out now) that the pinot grigio-swilling Singer“wanted Jill out and her friends in.”
(Alex McCord, 37, Kelly Bensimon, 43, and Cindy Barshop, 47, were also axed from the hit reality series . )
According to the source, Singer“came to Bravo with a few pals she thought would make good additions. Bravo decided to go with the new girls and not Jill, so Ramona basically ran her off the show.”
Singer insists she doesn’t wield that much power, telling Us:“We can recommend people to come to the show, but it’s not my decision.”
Though Zarin was part of the original cast, she probably won’t be missed by her former costars.“Jill caused a lot of problems,”another insider tells Us.“Her castmates were upset with her, since she’d tweet all these negative things. Karma’s a bitch.”
The“insider”who is trying to blame Ramona is most likely Jill herself but as Ramona says, she can only recommend people, she doesn’t get to cast the show. (or casted if you’re Kelly Bensimon) I would bet at any time all of the Housewives have made recommendations to Bravo over the years and introduced friends or acquaintances to Andy at parties. We all heard the rumor that Bravo was planning on replacing some of the housewives, what better opportunity to make some suggestions? Of course a Housewife would prefer to work with friends than the unknown!
I can confirm that Ramona does not know Heather Thomson and that she was not one of Ramona’s recommendations. The bottom line is that Jill was going to be fired regardless of whether or not Ramona introduced some of her friends to Bravo producers. If they hadn’t found new cast members through Ramona, they’d have found them another way.
Jill appeared on the Joy Behar show yesterday, you can watch it here:
http://joybehar.blogs.cnn.com/2011/09/22/jill-zarin-on-being-fired-from-real-housewives/
Joy wasted a lot of time talking about how Jill got fired, it was on the telephone, Joy thought it should be in person. Joy thought that they should go to Jill’s house and fire her there. How stupid! Who does that? Can you imagine how awkward that would have been, particularly for Jill,“You’re fired Jill”Jill would respond,“ahh ok, would you like some tea and latkas?”Joy is a moron!
Jill actually seemed shocked at Ramona’s comments and says that Ramona is beating a dog when it’s down and putting a nail in the coffin…..I suppose it was ok for Jill to spread rumors that Ramona is an alcoholic and that Mario is cheating on her. Jill calls people“toxic”yet she’s surprised that Ramona used the word“cancerous”. Joy’s quote was actually twisted (shocking!). What Ramona said was that their relationship was cancerous and she didn’t even blame Jill for all of the issues. The bottom line is that these two women do not like each other so why all the shock? Because Jill was fired, suddenly Ramona should become fake and act like she’s sorry that Jill is leaving?
Inside Information: I’m told by a trusted source that this is truly the first time that a Housewife has actually been“Fired”. Typically a contract will not be renewed or a release in a contract will be activated. In this case the most recent contract signed by the ousted New York Housewives still had four months left and pay checks were still owed for those four months but this firing stopped any future payments. Interesting, huh?

Project Runway by BB
Insert Rachel Zoe photo here…I mean…nevermind (a joke for BB!)
There are only 8 designers left. Heidi meets them on the runway and tells them only one thing. Image is Everything. Tim will meet them at a music studio to give them the details. Garnier has partnered with Rolling Stone to feature an up and coming band in the magazine. The band is called the Sheep Dogs. There will be two teams of 4. Team One is Oliver, Viktor, Kimberly and Josh. Laura, Bert, Anthony Ryan and Anya are on Team Two and they name themselves Team Harmony. Remember Anthony Ryan and Bert before when they were on the same team? Not pretty. Laura is also not very excited to be on Bert’s team again. The Sheep Dogs are a four member band and their music style is kind of classic rock, so they are big on denim and suede. One member mentions some type of caftan he likes to wear. Oliver is the only one who has no problem doing men’s clothing. Each team will create looks for the whole band and each designer will style one member of the band. Tim says the band doesn’t have to be cohesive, but they do have to look like they came from the same planet. Anya wants to design for Sam, Laura wants to design for Leot, Anthony Ryan wants Ryan, so that leaves lead singer Ewan for Bert. Oliver is going to design Ewan, Josh has Ryan, Viktor has Leot, and Kimberly will be designing for Sam. Each team gets together to plan. Josh thinks Bert has lived through the rock era, but can he remember the rock era?
They all go to mood to get their fabrics. Anya is really having trouble finding a fabric she wants. Oliver is also taking his time and getting stressed about time running out. Laura overspent and Bert lends her his extra money. She tells him she takes back anything she has ever said about him. He tells her to take back what she’s gonna say about him. I wonder how much Oliver’s accent is affected. Anya says Oliver needs to get over the fact that his band member is bigger than his manikin model.
Josh is looking at this like an individual competition rather than a team competition. Anya and Viktor talk about Oliver picking the same fabric he picks every time and how he didn’t get along with his client on the last challenge. The dual designers meet with their clients for the styling consultation. Oliver and Bert meet with Ewan; Laura and Viktor meet with Leot; Anya and Kimberly meet with Sam; and Anthony and Josh meet with Ryan. There are no big differences about how the clients are going to be styled. Kimberly is really freaking out about not being able to do men’s wear. Bert’s dye job didn’t turn out how he expected; it’s too purple but he kind of likes it. Tim comes in and tells Laura she needs to go darker on the jean. Leot tells Laura he doesn’t like to show a lot of chest hair so he wants her tank top to not be so low cut. Sam likes Anya’s design so far. Anthony Ryan shows Ryan two different ideas and Ryan picks the one Anthony Ryan likes so they seem to be on the same page. Bert is showing Tim and Ewan his design and Ewan says it seems like a lot of purple. Tim says it’s too feminine and Ewan says it reminds him of his mom. Burt may have to start from scratch and I heard him say earlier he didn’t buy a lot of fabric. Uh Oh. Moving on, Tim and Leot meet with Viktor and he tells him he wants to add come crispiness to Leot’s look. He shows them a cowboy look pleather jacket that Laura says she doesn’t like. Kimberly tells Tim she borrowed fabric from Anya for Sam’s design and Anya may be regretting her generosity. Ryan and Josh and Tim meet and talk about Josh designing for a gay band, but Ryan likes Josh’s design. Oliver meets with Ewan and he kind of laughs at the swans on Oliver’s shirt. Oliver says he doesn’t know if he’s going to be happy, but he will look good. Oliver is having trouble with time management again. He has Ewan’s measurements, but is having trouble figuring out the design without the manikin being the exact right size. Tim tells him designers have to do that all the time. I’m getting sick of Oliver talking about “plus size” people. Get over it, Oliver. Everyone is not a stick figure. Tim comes back with the band members for the fittings. The designers feel sorry for Ewan because he has Bert’s design. He definitely looks uncomfortable. Tim is showing Oliver what is wrong with his fit on Ewan. I really feel sorry for Ewan that he got Bert and Oliver as his designers. Oliver comes into the break room and Josh tells him he’s worried about him because his forte is menswear and he seems to be struggling. Oliver doesn’t seem that concerned. Anthony Ryan and Kimberly are stressing about running out of time and want some extra hours, but time is up for the day. Back at the apartment, Anya and Kimberly can’t figure out where the time went when they’ve had two days, and are noticing the challenges are getting harder and harder. Oliver says his design is not the worst compared to the others.
It’s runway day and the designers are hurrying to finish their creations for the band members. Kimberly is concerned about the precision of finishing her design. Tim tells them the band will be performing in their outfits instead of walking the runway. Team Harmony’s designs will be featured first. Anya still has a lot to do. Ewan is a little happier with Bert’s final design. Ewan is worried about Oliver being finished on time. He has been sitting on a stool in his underwear for about an hour waiting for him to finish. Oliver doesn’t see time management as an issue. Bert thinks Kimberly’s outfit looks like it belongs in a fast food restaurant. The band members go down for hair and makeup. They put Ewan’s hair in braids. It’s time to go to the runway and Anya thinks she and Kimberly are clearly in the bottom. We’ll see. The guest judge is American Idol’s Adam Lambert. The band performs in Team Harmony’s designs first. Ewan’s wearing Bert’s design; Leot is wearing Laura’s design; Sam is wearing Anya’s design and Ryan is wearing Anthony Ryan’s design. In my opinion, the band looks like old school seventies, which I kind of like. Anya hates her garment because the fit is not flattering. She wants to run out of the room. Laura likes her garment and thinks it’s flattering. Bert thinks Ewan looks spectacular and it looks very now and contemporary. Not sure if Ewan would have picked out that for himself.
The band is now performing in Team Untitled’s designs. What, they couldn’t even come up with a name? Ewan is wearing Oliver’s design; Leot is wearing Viktor’s design; Sam is wearing Kimberly’s design; and Ryan is wearing Josh’s design. Josh thinks Ryan’s look is really solid. Kimberly thinks Sam blends in with the band OK. She is just happy he’s dressed. Viktor thinks Leot’s jacket is stunning. Oliver is feeling generally good, but he sees some problems with proportion. Compared to some other people, he’s not worried.
I liked Team Harmony’s look the best, but this is going to be judged individually. This was hard to judge with the band members playing instead of walking the runway. If I had to pick some favorites, I would have to say Laura, Viktor, Josh and Anthony Ryan’s designs. I may not even been close to what the judges think, though. Sometimes they are hard to figure out. I’m sure they are going to say something about Ewan’s braids. Heidi is going to talk to Team Harmony first. Of the band’s combined look, Michael says there’s no swagger and Nina says it’s kind of an expected look. Laura explains her look first. Leot likes her colors. Heidi says it’s one of her favorite outfits. Adam says it’s one of his favorites as well. Michael is not a fan of the tye dye colors and it looks like he cut himself shaving. Nina doesn’t like it and thinks it looks like a lady’s jacket. Bert is next and Ewan says it’s outside of his comfort zone. All the judges seem to like the outfit. Heidi doesn’t like the pigtails and Nina loves them. Michael and Nina like Bert’s look. Nina thinks Anya’s look is too much like Pocahontas. Michael thinks he looks like Reggae Jesus. Anthony Ryan is next. Ryan kind of digs the sleeveless shirt. Michael says it looks polished. Nina thinks it looks like a woman’s blouse. Adam doesn’t think the look goes together. Well, I was right about some, but I am surprised they like Bert’s outfit.
Next is Team Untitled. Oliver is first. Ewan says it’s his style but he doesn’t like the color of the pants. Oliver defends his color. Heidi says it’s boring and they look like dad jeans. Nina says he doesn’t look the part of the lead singer of the band. Oliver didn’t have time to put a cuff on the shirt and rolled up the sleeves to hide it. Heidi was not fooled. Kimberly is next. Sam says he likes the pants but somewhere along the line the shirt got lost. Michael says he’s Peter Brady. Nina says it looks like old man pajamas. Adam says Scooby Doo Where Are You. Heidi says Forest Elf. Viktor is next. Michael and Heidi think the jacket is insane and it looks very expensive. Adam says the jacket has great movement. They like the sexy fit of the jeans. Nina says a lot of very impressive work. Josh is next and I think Adam is lusting after him. Ryan likes Josh’s look. Heidi likes it, but thinks it’s too many things. Adam thinks it’s a little too much, too. So does Nina. Michael likes it. Overall the judges like Josh’s design.
OK. Time for the judges’ deliberations. They didn’t like Oliver, Anya or Kimberly. Adam thinks Anya’s was the worst. Michael kind of takes up for Anya because of her inexperience in sewing, and thinks Oliver is the worst because menswear is supposed to be his specialty. They call Kimberly’s Salvation Army. They all three crashed and burned. Whoa, one of the favorites is going home and I don’t think it’s going to be Anya. I think it’s going to be Oliver. Kimberly pretty well admitted to the judges that she was just glad the guy was wearing pants and a top. I think they appreciated her candor. They talk about the favorites. Heidi doesn’t agree with Michael’s opinion of Viktor’s design. She says it wasn’t that “hot.” Michael likes Bert’s, but Adam didn’t like his pinstriped pants. I personally liked Laura’s the best. Bert is in. And the winner is . . . Viktor. It seems that Michael and Nina wear the pants in this group. Laura, Josh and Anthony Ryan are all in and they leave the runway. Anya is in and can leave the runway. It’s down to Kimberly and Oliver. I hope they don’t send Kimberly home because I think she’s a better designer than Oliver. Yay! Oliver is going home. Kimberly is very happy she is safe and she is very emotional about it. Oliver is not very emotional about leaving.
Thanks BB, great job! xo Lynn~

For right now, I would suggest when in the lunging, barking situation that you say:“No”or Ah”and immediately turn away from the target with a quick sideways jerk on the leash. Walk briskly in the opposite direction. When at home teach him to“speak”: you bark and when he barks say good boy&give him a treat. Keep this up until he barks on command. Then teach him“hush”. When he is barking (for any reason) say“hush”. As soon as he stops barking, say good boy and give him a treat. Be over the top with praise of what a good boy he is. Go back and forth between speak and hush until he understands. It won’t take long–Shepherds are very smart. Praise and treats are the key. Once he knows“hush”use it outside. Also, I assume at his age he knows“sit”. If he doesn’t sit immediately on command, work on that so that he does. Don’t praise or treat him for anything other than an immediate sit. When out walking him if he starts lunging and barking, stop, say SIT, HUSH. If he has learned his lessions at home he should obey. Remember to“good boy”him then–but quietly so as not to excite him. Also, only give any command once and say it like you mean it. Not loud, just firm.
Dogs want to be happy. We want to be happy. Our dogs are happy when we are happy and vise versa. Keep the training sessions short. Dogs loose interest quickly. ALWAYS be upbeat. ALWAYS end on a happy note.
